explains: adj. 谦逊的；不装腔作势的；不出风头的

sentences.en: He's a man of few words, very polite and unassuming.
sentences.cn: 他不爱说话，非常有礼貌，也不装腔作势。

sentences.en: He was a small and by all appearances an unassuming man.
sentences.cn: 他是个个子小并且从一切表象看来不装腔作势的人。

sentences.en: She had an open face and pale skin, a medium build and an unassuming manner.
sentences.cn: 她神情坦然，肤色白皙，体形中等，态度谦逊。
